titleInfo.title: New High School: Development Fund Appeal, 1963

mods.abstract: Eventually the buildings at Christian Brothers East Parkway campus could no long accommodate both a high school and a college. The new Christian Brothers High School would be build on 25 acres near the intersection of Walnut Grove and "the Expressway" (I-40). The development funds were raised for both for the construction of the new high school, as well as make capital improvements to the college.
